title: Inflation rate in Saint Lucia 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has stayed the same over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 1997 to 1998, and lastly roughly constant from 1998 to 2017.

The line rapidly increased by 31900.0% from Year 1997 to 1998,remained stable by 100.41% from Year 1999 to 2000,remained stable by 95.07% from Year 2001 to 2002,remained stable by 296.15% from Year 2002 to 2003,remained stable by 167.81% from Year 2004 to 2005,remained stable by 96.81% from Year 2007 to 2008,remained stable by 97.12% from Year 2008 to 2009,increased by 1931.25% from Year 2009 to 2010,remained stable by 139.46% from Year 2013 to 2014,remained stable by 72.16% from Year 2014 to 2015,remained stable by 214.29% from Year 2015 to 2016, and lastly, remained stable by 96.43% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 5.55 was reached at Year 2008
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 0.01 was reported at Year 1997
